ygData.subject: Re: NBW
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll be alright Wing, anone hurt by the blast? he d do or say almost anything to change the conversation. It wasn t working. I don t see any other glowing

"I'll be alright Wing, anone hurt by the blast?" he'd do or say 
almost anything to change the conversation. It wasn't working.

"I don't see any other glowing sights around here." he tried to 
change her mood, that didn't work either

"OK Wing you want the truth, here it is. It wasn't an entire platoon 
of Preds, it was only four or five. I would'v stayed to finish them 
but I figured they won't mess with me again. That is once they're out 
of Stasis lock." He still didn't want to admit his stupidity to her.

"I would've called but I didn't want to ruin your fun." with any luck 
she'd stop the interogation. Again he knew his luck.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She smlied when she knew he was alright. "How are you feeling? Yes 
> there was an explosion, but all is calm now." She took a quick over 
> look of him to make sure he was all healed.  "Glowing sight huh? 
me? 
> yeah I'll be glowing alright, as soon as you tell me what really 
> happened out there.  You looked like you faught an entire platoon 
of 
> preds.  What happened?"
> She turned and took a few steps away, turned and looked at him.
> "Blast, I was worried sick. No messages, no communication at all, I 
> was about to fly the globe looking for you. THank the Matrix your 
> alright. But what happened?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> >   Lunarpine awoke, the sedative wearing off, his first sight was 
> > Shadow Wing looking in on him. "What happened Wing," he 
asked "What 
> > was that explosion?" He stared at her a moment, she seemed to 
have 
> an 
> > almost angelic glow around her.
> > 
> > "I must be functional there wouldn't be such a glowing sight in 
the 
> > Pit." Shadow Wing no longer looked angry at him, just concerned.
> >
